channel.name: CRIS_ORH_OMG-ORU_Q
channel.description:
Publishing channel for CRIS ORH RIS ORM & ORU messages. Uses Q #
--== HISTORY ==-- $Rev: 324 $ $Id: CRIS_ORH_OMG-ORU_Q.xml 324 2012-11-15 08:54:35Z MarkD $ 04-10-11 MRD Cloned from CRIS_NOC_OMG-ORU_Q MRD Prefix ORH filler order numbers so that they can be distinguised for NOC numbers 18-10-11 MRD Put source of messages (ORH, NOC) into OBR 19 so subscriber channel can see it. 10-11-11 HS Modified getPromotedData() call in enqueueing JS Destination to use a channel specific Promoter Modified code to added advanced publishing code 10-11-11 MRD Add referral location filter to ORU destination using translation set 'UNSOL_LOC_FILTER' 16-11-11 HS Imported channel from TEST. Queueing to q0018 [OMG] and q0019 [ORU] 23-11-11 MRD Corrected transformation to delete non RTH MRN's from ORU PID 3 05-12-11 MRD Modified OMG PID3 processing to accomadate RIS behavior 20/12/11 MRD Modified so does not store filtered message data
-== TO DO ==- Completed 04-10-11 MRD Remove MRN prefix
**** PLEASE CHECK SOURCE/DESTINATION CONNECTION DETAILS WHEN MIGRATING CHANNEL TO NEW ENVIRONMENT ****

step.name: messageControlID
step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['MSH']['MSH.10']['MSH.10.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('messageControlID', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

step.name: julianDateNow
step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = DateUtil.getCurrentDate("yyyyDDD");; }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('julianDateNow', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

step.name: julianDateTimeNow
step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = DateUtil.getCurrentDate("DDDHHmmssSSS");; }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('julianDateTimeNow', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

step.name: event
step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['MSH']['MSH.9']['MSH.9.2'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('event', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

step.name: Prefix Filler Order Number
CreateACK
PID3
Mark OBR with org source of message
Put message XML in channelMap

rule.name: Filter for just OMG and ORG messages

step.name: PID3
Put message XML in channelMap

rule.name: Filter ORU messages from NOC
Referral Loaction Filter

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
